column2: Hey there! I'm heading up the search for the fob hidden in Fizzics. Want to join me?
Of course!

Fantastic. We really need your help! Saniel told me Riley made some hidden Fizzics levels. 

She made them as a Fizzics assignment for Saniel and he implemented them so we can play them. 

So let's play them now and see if we find one of the access fobs. Launch Fizzics and let's go!
First, you need to get to level 11.
Here we are at level 11! We need to pass this one to get to Riley's secret levels.
Remember: To beat a level you need to fling all the orange balls into the target.
There are no goals in this level. Maybe you should add a goal.
Click the Flip button and enable the *Add* tool.
Oh hey! You already finished Riley's levels!
Great. You made it into Riley's secret levels! Now see if you can beat them all.
Ouch! What's up with those balls falling right when the level begins!
Changing the gravity variable might be very useful right now.
Wait, what? No fling tool? How can you solve this problem?
You know by now, flip the app and Hack it!
Good try, but try another solution.
What if you unfreeze the goal?
Maybe add gravity to the goal?
So you can fling in this level, but now the goal is blocked.
No fling tool again, how can you solve this?
Great, now you have the fling tool, but you can't get near the balls!
Smart strategy, but it won't work. Riley programmed it so you can only win with the fling tool.

You did it! That was really clever work! 

Oh hey, I think I found one of those fobs we're looking for! Let's hope this works!
OK, let's keep exploring this later.
